products.name: Rice Krispies
products.description: Delicious corn-based rice grains melted together with marshmallows into a square-like shape.

products.name: Flamin Hot Cheetos
products.description: No one knows what's in the powder that covers these snacks, but wow is it amazing!

products.name: Watermelon
products.description: These seedless watermelons have a crisp, juicy flavor. Enjoy anytime as a healthy, hydrating vitamin-packed snack.

products.name: Roses
products.description: A delightful assortment of the freshest roses is the perfect gift for a birthday, anniversary, or just because. Every rose has a different meaning, and with all the colors of the rainbow, this bouquet is sure to fill their day with joy for any occasion.

products.name: Pokemon Cards
products.description: Shiny Pokémon are so rare that they're almost never seen, and Trainers who catch a Shiny Pokémon consider themselves to be quite lucky—which makes Trainers who manage to catch a Pokémon TCG: Shining Fates Elite Trainer Box very lucky indeed, as the expansion includes more than 100 Shiny Pokémon on beautifully etched cards. Pokémon V and Pokémon VMAX also make an appearance with more than 30 such powerful Pokémon including a Shiny Charizard in Gigantamax form.
